StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAUpdateEduca.onLevelAndCode]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID int, @SCHOOL_CODE int, @OLD_EDUCATION_LEVEL varchar(2), @OLD_EDUCATION_CODE varchar(1), @NEW_EDUCATION_LEVEL varchar(2), @NEW_EDUCATION_CODE char(1)
AS
declare @USER_LOGIN varchar(15) set @USER_LOGIN = (select le.(current_user,15))
IF (@MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID IS NOT NULL) AND (@OLD_EDUCATION_LEVEL IS NOT NULL) AND (@SCHOOL_CODE IS NOT NULL) BEGIN UPDATE CANDIDATE_EDUCATION SET USER_LOGIN=@USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE=GETDATE(), EDUCATION_LEVEL=@NEW_EDUCATION_LEVEL, EDUCATION_CODE=@NEW_EDUCATION_CODE WHERE EDUCATION_LEVEL=@OLD_EDUCATION_LEVEL AND EDUCATION_CODE=@OLD_EDUCATION_CODE AND SCHOOL_CODE=@SCHOOL_CODE AND MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID=@MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID PRINT 'CANDIDATE_EDUCATION INFORMATION UPDATED!' END ELSE PRINT 'MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, EDUCATION_LEVEL AND SCHOOL_CODE CANNOT BE NULL!'
